title: [Large-Scale] Blended Learning-Based ICT and E-Learning Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ICT utilization skills and language education experience
context.additional_context: A competency-building program for practitioners to effectively integrate ICT and e-learning into language education settings with limited smartphone-centric technology.

learning_goals: Learners can explain blended learning model design and operational strategies for language education
Learners can create interactive digital learning materials using smartphone-based LMS tools
Learners can develop e-learning strategies applicable to real-world language education settings through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
